ServerID: the server the bot will be running on
LockedRoleID: the role to be given to locked users (readme)
GeneralChannel: channel to @mention users who disabled their DMs

RoleCommands.!18: aliases are possible, so this could be the same role as above

WelcomeEmbed.Message: Welcome, new user. this message will be part of an embed
WelcomeEmbed.BugsText: please ask <@%s>. (this will be formatted with the AdminID above
